statements: UPDATE users SET email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;

UPDATE user_security_answers SET answer_text = 'new_answer' WHERE question_id = (SELECT question_id FROM security_questions WHERE question_text = 'What is your favorite color?') AND user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'jane_smith');
